attributes.action: Ensure that despite the recession the promises of aid made by the G8 to the less economically developed countries are honoured.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In our school assemblies we have been introduced to the catastrophic situation facing sub-Saharan African nations due to HIV and Aids. We want Mr Brown to ensure that all promises of financial and other help made by the G8 are honoured.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
